Package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.controller

package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.controller
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    GameActivity
    Represents the GameActivity within the application, where the gameplay occurs.
    LoginActivity
    Presents a simple login screen, which is bypassed if a silent refresh/sign-in attempt succeeds.
    MainActivity
    Represents the main activity of the application, providing the main user interface.
    ScoresActivity
    Present a scores screen without any additional UI elements.
    SettingsActivity
    Hosts an instance of SettingsActivity.SettingsFragment to present a settings screen without any additional UI elements (such as options menu).
    SettingsActivity.SettingsFragment
    Presents a standard settings screen, populated from the PreferenceScreen declared in res/xml/settings.xml.
